sequence.msg: They don’t pay you or me enough to deal with this error. Click on the button, hold it for 5 seconds, and get a drink- something hard if you got it. You’ll need it.
We have way too many windows but who am I to judge, I guess. Just grab and drag the DataKeys file onto the error window. Voila! Have at it.

Ah, yeah, that’s a nasty one. Did you try turning it off and back on again? Oh wait, you’re in the cooldown department. You can’t do that, I guess, so just ignore it for now. It’s probably nothing. No, I’m just kidding. Go ahead and follow the instructions on the error message. That is literally how you fix it.

This one's pretty easy. You just type in what it says to type. It's case sensitive though so make sure all your uppercase letters are uppercase and all your lowercase letters are, well, lowercase. Good luck!
Not this again. I don't know why we even have so many servers with such horrible ping. Anyway, just choose one of the servers with the green or lowest ping. That's it. Hop to it, buddy.
You just press the button to update. It's right there. I thought you were an expert in button pushing. This should be right in your wheelhouse.

As all-knowing as everyone believes IT to be, this is actually something outside of what I can do. Go talk to Administrator. Danni can fix it up for you. Just don't ask them about anything related to rocks. Trust me on this one.

This is Tim in IT. What error did you receive?  I’d normally tell you to turn it off and back on again but you’re a button masher. Just sit back and take a break or something.
This is Tim in IT. What error did you receive? You tried turning it off and back on again, eh? No, you can’t, because you’re a cooldown operator. Just try something and hope for the best.
Not this again. I’ve reported this bug so many times… *sigh* Just ignore it like the bug they keep ignoring.
(AFK) Watering my plant. I think it's still alive.
(BUSY) Talking to Avondale. Very important meeting, yes.
(AFK) Stacking stones in a river somewhere. Brb
(AFK) Trying to throw Mr. Stickers off my trail. Brb
(AFK) Trying to make my city a better place. Brb
(AFK) Everything has gone 2D. Trying to return to 3D. Brb
